charges.charge_disposition: Dft is committed to the BOP for 30 months on Counts 1, 2 and 3 to run concurrently; followed by 3 years supervised of release on Counts 1, 2 and 3 to run concurrently. No fine. $300 MPA. Restitution imposed in the amount of $10,994.44. Special conditions of supervised of release imposed. Court recommends a dual diagnosis treatment program and UNICOR. Dft advised of right to appeal. Dft remanded into custody.
